item.description:
Yo everyone, sign up. We will climb Metro Rock Tuesday. Let's have fun.
Look up Metro Rock's web site - or call them: You will need to be belay tested before climbing if you are new to the gym. You can also take a class if you need to. I will try to wear red (or black or green.)
Give me a call with your questions: 603-930-8442 (before 10PM.)
Lopa


Everett / Boston
69 Norman Street
Everett, MA 02149
617 387-7625

They have a shuttle to the gym if you don't have a car.
item.name: Rock Climbing Boston February Meetup
